channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Governance Catalog
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Governance Catalog

item.title: CVE-2018-1875|2024-08-05T04:14:38.573Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20governance%20catalog
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Governance Catalog 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 151639.
